name: Bead Jar
description:
Game Basics:

If you don't move, the time wont't pass.
To pick up items, you have to get close enough to them.
The size of your backpack is 100. The sum of weights of the items in your backpack cannot exceed 100.
Time limit is 705 seconds.

Control Instruction:
WASD - Move
Space/Mouse Left Button - Pick up/Drop Highlighted Item
ESC - End the game immediately
